title: 蓬佩奧：是共產黨在威脅著美國和全球安全，而不是中國人民！

replies.msg:
https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2019/oct/31/pompeo-communist-party-not-chinese-people-threaten/

View Static Version
Pompeo: Communist Party, not Chinese people, threatens U.S. and global security
蓬佩奧：是共產黨在威脅著美國和全球安全，而不是中國人民！
By Bill Gertz - The Washington Times 比爾·蓋茨-華盛頓時報
Thursday, October 31, 2019 2019年10月31日星期四
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo is setting out an ambitious new U.S. foreign policy toward China, one that sees the ruling Communist Party as a national security threat and the force behind Beijing’s drive for global hegemony.
國務卿邁克·蓬佩奧正在制定一項雄心勃勃的美國對華新外交政策，該政策將執政的共產黨視為是美國國家安全的威脅，並將北京視為全球霸權得推手。。。。
https://spark.adobe.com/page/bpBTBzxdNVvbr/

the first time in decades a senior U.S. government leader has attempted to distinguish between China’s 1.4 billion people and the authoritarian Communist Party of some 90 million members. Analysts say the secretary’s comments also directly challenge the legitimacy of the Communist Party that seized power in 1949 under Mao Zedong.

數十年來首次有美國高級領袖將中國14億人口跟專橫的中共900萬成員分割；分析家指這是國務卿向1949年由毛澤東領導的中國共產黨奪權的認受性直接挑戰。
